item.description:
Join us for a fun evening helping out WGBH as we answer their phones during their pledge drive. This is a very fun activity. Pledge Operators answer phones and record pledges of support from donors as part of WGBH's fundraising drives. You must be able to speak clearly and have basic computer/data entry skills. Volunteers are given dinner and you can take breaks. Volunteer time is from 5:30-11pm (including training time when we arrive).  Volunteers must be able to stay until 11pm.

There is free parking at the indoor lot next door.

IMPORTANT

You must email Jaime Reese at WGBH: jaime_reese@wgbh.org in order to be on the volunteer list. In the email, please give her your full name and tell her that you are volunteering with Meet Up and signing up for the Monday, Dec. 5, 5:30pm, pledge operator volunteer position. She will send you an email to confirm that you are on the list. Please be sure to email Jaime Reese- simply signing up on Meet Up is not sufficient!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) directly inside the main entrance. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Volunteer at WGBH Phone Pledge Drive
